Name: [Hollow] Toy Laser Blade
Desc: All squad members' attack DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color>, but every time Pressure increases, it increases by an additional <color=#CF4029>3</color> Pressure.
Desc2: A toy laser blade that is all the rage with kids. If it's charged, the sword will extend and light up by pressing a button on the hilt (there are also some lackluster sound effects).
